segments.text: Has your company been affected much by government legislation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we have . We've had to clean up our production process a lot to meet tough government standards .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What about your use of raw materials ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we've had to cut down the amount of solvents we use and we â€™ re not allowed to use lead in our products any more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What happens if you exceed the limits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We try not to because you might have to pay quite a heavy fine .
segments.speaker: S2
